# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session

source.1035f74b:
df_plot_stacked = df_2017.copy()
df_plot_stacked["Rata-rata"] = (df_plot_stacked["SD"] + df_plot_stacked["SMP"] + df_plot_stacked["SMA"] + df_plot_stacked["PT"])/4
df_plot_stacked["Total"] = df_plot_stacked["SD"] + df_plot_stacked["SMP"] + df_plot_stacked["SMA"] + df_plot_stacked["PT"]
df_plot_stacked["SD"] = df_plot_stacked["SD"]/df_plot_stacked["Total"]*df_plot_stacked["Rata-rata"]
df_plot_stacked["SMP"] = df_plot_stacked["SMP"]/df_plot_stacked["Total"]*df_plot_stacked["Rata-rata"]
df_plot_stacked["SMA"] = df_plot_stacked["SMA"]/df_plot_stacked["Total"]*df_plot_stacked["Rata-rata"]
df_plot_stacked["PT"] = df_plot_stacked["PT"]/df_plot_stacked["Total"]*df_plot_stacked["Rata-rata"]

df_plot_stacked = df_plot_stacked.sort_values('Rata-rata',ascending=False)
df_plot_stacked.drop('Rata-rata', axis=1, inplace=True)
df_plot_stacked.drop('Total', axis=1, inplace=True)

source.e7a8371b:
df_plot_2015 = df_melek_huruf_2015.copy()
df_plot_2016 = df_melek_huruf_2016.copy()

df_plot_2015_head = df_plot_2015.sort_values('persentase',ascending=False).head(10)
df_plot_2016_head = df_plot_2016.sort_values('persentase',ascending=False).head(10)

df_plot_2015_tail = df_plot_2015.sort_values('persentase',ascending=True).head(10)
df_plot_2016_tail = df_plot_2016.sort_values('persentase',ascending=True).head(10)
source.a58f1960:
# create data
x = np.arange(10)
y1 = df_plot_2016_head["persentase"]
y2 = df_plot_2015_head["persentase"]
width = 0.4
  
plt.figure(figsize=(20,6))
plt.title("10 Provinsi dengan Persentase Melek Huruf Terbesar Tahun 2015 dan 2016\n")

# plot data in grouped manner of bar type
plt.bar(x-0.2, y1, width, color='#F4CFDF')
plt.bar(x+0.2, y2, width, color='#B6D8F2')
plt.xticks(x, df_plot_2016_head["Provinsi"], rotation="vertical")
plt.xlabel("Provinsi")
plt.ylabel("Persentase")
plt.ylim(99,100)
plt.legend(["2016", "2015"])
plt.show()

source.b21d4fe1:
# Content 1. [[LINE CHART]
Persentase rata-rata partisipasi sekolah SD, SMP, SMA, Perguruan Tinggi di Indonesia tahun 2011 - 2017](#1)

1. [[STACKED BAR CHART]
Persentase Partisipasi Pendidikan Tiap Provinsi dari Terbesar ke Terkecil Tahun 2017](#2)

1. [[BAR CHART]
Persentase Masyarakat yang Menempuh Pendidikan Perguruan Tinggi dari Terbesar ke Terkecil di Tiap Provinsi Tahun 2017](#3)

1. [[COLUMN BAR CHART]
Provinsi dengan Persentase Melek Huruf Terbesar dan Terkecil Tahun 2015 dan 2016](#4)

1. [[SCATTER PLOT WITH REGRESSION LINE]
Korelasi Persentase Angka Partisipasi SD Tahun 2016 dengan Persentase Melek Huruf Tahun 2016](#5)

1. [[HISTOGRAM, KDE PLOT]
Distribusi Persentase Angka Partisipasi Sekolah](#6)

1. [[HEATMAP]
Visualize Pattern with Heatmap](#7)
